content: @Johan Commelin You approved this PR but did not mark it as ready to merge. Do you want it merged?
Also, you haven't assigned it to yourself
@Simon Hudon I wouldn't mind having it merged (which is what I tried to convey with my "Approve" :smiley:). But I wouldn't mind if another maintainer also took a look at the PR.
I guess this PR defaults to Reid, since he is currently listed as maintainer of category theory.
